status.name: In QA

fields.description:
Noting the following 'services' properties for the following:
Are 'not' marked as read-only
...and...
Do not have default values, or may not have sane default values
In an effort to make eucalyptus properties manageable. Suggesting these properties' attributes are updated, and/or we add an additional attribute to reflect their intended usage as 'internal or system' or as 'cloud administrative'(for both administrative and/or developer purposes). 
Thanks!, 
-M
{code}
+-------------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--+
|PROPERTY NAME                              |PROPERTY VALUE|DEFAULT |RO|
+-------------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--+
|services.database.appendonlyhost           |localhost     |        |F |
|services.database.appendonlypassword       |********      |        |F |
|services.database.appendonlysslcert        |********      |        |F |
|services.imaging.worker.instance_type      |m1.medium     |m1.small|F |
|services.loadbalancing.dns_resolver_enabled|true          |        |F |
+-------------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--+
{code}

comments.body:
Services configuration variable defaults are now:

{code}
#
# euctl -d services.
services.billing.enabled = true
services.billing.sensor_queue_attributes = {"DelaySeconds": "0", "MaximumMessageSize": "262144", "MessageRetentionPeriod": "10800", "ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds": "0", "VisibilityTimeout": "120"}
services.billing.sqs_client_config = {"ConnectionTimeout": 10000, "MaxConnections": 100}
services.billing.swf_activity_worker_config = {"PollThreadCount": 4, "TaskExecutorThreadPoolSize": 32, "MaximumPollRateIntervalMilliseconds": 50, "MaximumPollRatePerSecond": 20 }
services.billing.swf_domain = BillingDomain
services.billing.swf_tasklist = BillingTasks
services.billing.swf_workflow_worker_config = { "DomainRetentionPeriodInDays": 1, "PollThreadCount": 4, "MaximumPollRateIntervalMilliseconds": 50, "MaximumPollRatePerSecond": 20 }
services.database.appendonlyhost = localhost
services.database.appendonlypassword =

services.loadbalancing.vm_per_zone = 1

services.loadbalancing.worker.keyname =

services.loadbalancing.worker.use_elastic_ip = false
services.simplequeue.active_queue_time_secs = 21600

services.simplequeue.db_to_use = auto
services.simplequeue.enable_long_polling = true
services.simplequeue.enable_metrics_collection = true

services.simplequeue.max_maximum_message_size = 262144
